Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.leader

Class BoostAbility

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.leader.BoostAbility
All Implemented Interfaces:
Card, LeaderCard
public class BoostAbility
extends java.lang.Object
implements LeaderCard
This LeaderCard works similarly to a ProductionCard: it has a production power that players can decide to activate if they have the card and the latter is active.

In order to activate the card, players must have all the production cards specified in cost, even if they're hidden. Use the isActive() method to discover its status.
